subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nicolas Kerdiles scored two goals and Collin Olson made 27 saves as the United States defeated Sweden, 7-0, in the final of the International Ice Hockey Federation under-18 championships in Brno, Czech Republic.
snippet: Nicolas Kerdiles scored two goals and Collin Olson made 27 saves as the United States defeated Sweden, 7-0, in the final of the International Ice Hockey Federation under-18 championships in Brno, Czech Republic.
